parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Camera Control </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Set the zoom level ('''F'''ield '''O'''f '''V'''iew) of the given camera.
<br>
The zoom level is from ''<tt>0.01</tt>'' for the nearest and ''<tt>8.5</tt>'' for the furthest zoom value, with a default zoom level of ''<tt>0.75</tt>''
<br>
The angle of the field of view is ''<tt>atan(FOV)*2</tt>'' radians when in 4:3 aspect ratio. Needs the call of [[camCommit]] to be conducted.
 </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> camera '''camSetFov''' level </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> camera: [[Object]] - object of type "camera" </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> level: [[Number]] - zoom level, range 0.01 to 8.5 (see description above) </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_cam [[camSetFov]] 0.75;</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[camPrepareFov]], [[camSetFovRange]], [[camSetTarget]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
